name: Juke - Football Endless Runner Game
description:
Do you live and breathe football?
Do you wish the football season lasted 12 months a year?

Now it can... with Juke. During any spare moment, you can blast a breakaway power run to the end zone. Just be careful not to spike your iPhone or iPad into the ground with your touchdown dance.

Juke combines the excitement of American football with classic arcade game action. Dodge the opposing team's players to score a touchdown. Keep running! Collect money and health to prolong your run. Try a spin-juke move to get out of trouble.

Grab a briefcase for a burst of power running and temporary invincibility. Smash some cars while you are at it. And watch out for referees... you have been warned!

This is the free version of Juke. One player / runner is provided for free. There is opportunity to unlock additional characters in-game for free, or in-app purchase for all available characters and removal of ads.

Maelstrom Interactive is a small, family company from Kirkland, Washington. If you enjoy Juke, please help us by leaving a review in the iTunes app store. Thanks!
